basics.name: Awahid Safhadi
basics.summary: I am an experienced backend developer with a strong background in creating, testing, and deploying APIs. My skills include TypeScript, MySQL, NestJS, and more. I have worked on various projects in different industries and am passionate about delivering high-quality solutions.

education.area: DESIGN AND PROGGRAMING DATABASE WITH SQL

highlights: Responsible for designing and testing APIs using a range of technologies including TypeScript, MySql, NestJs, TypeOrm, Laravel, and Eloquent. Additionally, I am proficient in manually building and deploying these APIs to Alibaba server.

To ensure smooth coordination with the front-end division, I work closely with them to determine the API response required. In the event of any bugs or errors, I efficiently troubleshoot and fix them to ensure optimal performance.
Responsible for creating, testing APIs using typeScript, MySql, NestJs for adawms.com
Do manual build to AWS server
Coordinate with the front-end division to determine the resulting API response
Monitor the data that goes to the kobotoolbox server
Processing incoming data to the server becomes simpler
Building an information system "Perjalanan Dinas" using the Laravel framework and mySql
